To check survey answers statistics that are already placed in database, use \'Statistics\' option from navigation bar. It provides all active answers with occurrence counter for each of them. Application does not provide information about any answers with \'open\' type. To show and hide statistics, you can use two dedicated buttons. \n \n To fill out a survey, use \'Survey\' option from navigation bar. After loading, it immediately initializes first survey question. Each question must be answered by choosing available options or by filling \'open\' question field. Survey answers are sent after pressing a button under information about survey end. It appears only after filling all required answers. If you shutdown your application before pressing that button, your answers won\'t be sent to database.
